alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels, northwestern Roosevelt and northern Valley Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Opheim. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Opheim, Richland, Flaxville, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Port Of Scobey, Whitetail, Port Of Opheim, Peerless, Four Buttes, West Fork, Thoeny, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
